name: Hospitable
description: Smart automation for guest messaging, review management, and cross-platform hosting.
target_audience_match: Perfect for solo Airbnb hosts who want to sound human, stay responsive, and get more 5-star reviews without doing it all manually.

name: OwnerRez + Messaging Add-On
description: Robust PMS with a customizable messaging engine for review-focused hosts.
target_audience_match: Ideal for hosts who want granular control over their communication while building long-term guest satisfaction.

name: Hostaway
description: Full-suite STR software with AI messaging that prioritizes guest satisfaction and ratings.
target_audience_match: Great for hosts scaling their operations who still want to maintain a personal, review-friendly tone with guests.

name: Smartbnb (now part of Hospitable)
description: AI messaging made for Airbnb — with logic-based responses and auto-reviews.
target_audience_match: Tailored for detail-oriented hosts who want every guest touchpoint to feel intentional — and improve reviews over time.

name: Enso Connect
description: AI guest experience platform with messaging, reviews, and smart flows in one hub.
target_audience_match: For hosts who want messaging to be part of a seamless guest journey — from check-in to review request.
